features.title: Power Search
features.description: Find activities and warm-ups based on your specific needs such as group size, available time, and focus points.

features.title: Animated Instructionals
features.description: Short narrated animations quickly explain the basics of any exercise so you can start practice faster.

features.title: Video Examples
features.description: Watch how exercises and warm-ups are used in practice by experienced improvisers.

howTo.title: Run: `npm i` to install the dependencies
